RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 1 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 10000. (PLUS UP TO $5,000 THRIF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED AT THE 2023 MEET AND HAVE NOT FINISHED 1ST, 2ND OR 3RD AT THE CURRENT MEET. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000, For Each $500 To $3,000 2 lbs. (Horse s that win this condition are no longer eligible for this condition while all other starters in this condition remain eligible.)(Winning this race will not be considered in eligibility in any other condition maidens excluded). British Columbia Bred Claimi ng Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CERTIFIABLE away alertly and dueled for the lead from the outside of TIMELESS SHRUG entering the stretch the first time, continued to force the issue two wide in the run down the backside, took control entering the final turn while racing one out from the rail, and held VALUE MAX safely at bay late to prevail. VALUE MAX away well and tracked the leaders through the stretch the first time while racing one out from the rail, maintained his position in the run down the backside, launched his bid three wide entering the final turn, and closed willingly four wide in the drive to prove second best. BODEGA tracked the dueling leaders while saving ground at the rail through the stretch the first time, commenced his bid from along the rail entering the final turn, but was unable to sustain his bid in deep stretch while finishing one out from the rail. TIMELESS SHRUG broke sharply and vied for the lead from along the rail entering the stretch the first time, set a pressured pace from along the rail in the run down the backstretch, was unable to keep tabs on her pace rival entering the final turn, and weakened over the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Bodega
ENTRY.OWNER: Snow Roger E and Doyle Maurice
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked rail, rallied inside, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Timeless Shrug
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, vied rail, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Value Max
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, tracked 2 wide, rallied 3 wide, closed 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Certifiable
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, dueled 2 wide, led rail, closed 3 wide, held

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Gatewood Bell, Wesley Ward, Bret Jones,Wes Welker & Drew F

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 2 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 11000. (PLUS UP TO $5,500 THRIF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since August 1 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000, For Each $500 To $3,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ASKMENOQUESTIONS away alertly and raced to the lead entering the first turn while dropping down to the rail, controlled the pace in the run through the stretch the first time, maintained his advantage in the run down the backside, increased his lead through the final turn, and was never threatened late. CHAMPIOSA tracked the leader through the stretch the first time while saving ground along the inside, maintained his position in the run down the backstretch, rallied along the inside entering the final turn, and finished willingly from along the rail in the drive to get up for the place. SILARONE broke sharply and tracked the leader through the stretch the first time while racing one out from the rail, held his position in the run down the backside, rallied two wide through the final turn, and finished one out from the rail in the drive to prove best of the rest. Following the running of this race, SILARONE appeared to have had an issue and was pulled up on the backstretch and walked off under his own power. TUXEDO settled off the early pace while racing one out from the rail entering the backside, began to advance midway down the backstretch, rallied three wide entering the final turn, and finished one out from the rail in the drive while unable to mount a serious late bid. MILO'S COMMAND away well and settled off the early pace while saving ground at the rail, but weakened over the final furlong. EH TEE EM unhurried early while dropping back to trail, was always well back and failed to make a late impression.

ENTRY.NAME: Eh Tee Em
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Champiosa
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked rail, rallied inside, closed rail

ENTRY.NAME: Silarone
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, tracked 2 w, rallied 2 w, closed 2 w, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Milo's Command
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, settled rail, rallied inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Tuxedo
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 2 wide, rallied 3 wide, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Askmenoquestions
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led rail, rallied inside, drew clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 3 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 12000. (PLUS UP TO $6,000 THRIF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 1 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 1 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, For Each $625 To $5,000 2 lbs. (Races W here Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility And Allowances). British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $8,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUAGMIRE away alertly and raced to the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, set a pressured pace through the stretch the first time and in the run down the backside, continued to battle from the inside of FAMILY BIZ entering the final turn, got the better of his pace rival in mid stretch, and was all out to hold off GOOD BYE PUTIN late to prevail. GOOD BYE PUTIN stalked the leaders into the stretch the first time while saving ground at the rail, raced into a tracking trip in the run down the backside, rallied along the inside entering the final turn, and closed steadily at the rail in the drive to just miss. FAMILY BIZ away well and pressed the pace from the outside of QUAGMIRE entering the stretch the first time, continued to force the issue two wide in the run down the backside and through the final turn, and gave way grudgingly late. FOOT SOLDIER broke sharply and tracked the leaders through the stretch the first time while racing one out from the rail, commenced his bid two wide entering the final turn, but lacked the needed closing response when called upon. BARNEY GOOGLE unhurried early while dropping back to trail entering the stretch the first time, bided his time at the back of the pack in the run down the backstretch, rallied two wide through the final turn, but failed to make a late impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Good Bye Putin
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked rail, rallied inside, closed rail

ENTRY.NAME: Barney Google
ENTRY.OWNER: Roberts-Henson Michelle Henson Brad Henson Randy Henson Dan and Irwin Trevor
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Family Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, pressed 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Foot Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, tracked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Quagmire
ENTRY.OWNER: Henson Lorie Klimes Helen and Pring Sharon
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led rail, rallied inside, held

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 16000. (PLUS UP TO $8,000 THRIF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Weight, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 1 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 1 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000, For Each $2,500 To $20,000 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered For Allowances). British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $32,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUCKY FORCE dueled for the lead from the outside of LICORICE entering the stretch the first time, took command from the outside of his pace rival midway down the backside, maintained a clear advantage into the final turn, and widened his advantage late while under confident handling. ROCKCLIFFE away alertly, and settled into a tracking trip from just off the rail entering the first turn, held his position in the run down the backside, rallied three wide entering the final turn, and closed four wide in the drive to get the place. TIME TICKER settled at the back of a compact field entering the first turn, began to creep closer in the run down the backstretch, shifted three wide to mount his bid entering the final turn, and finished five wide in the drive to garner a share. LICORICE broke sharply and vied for the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, was unable to match strides with LUCKY FORCE midway down the backstretch, tipped off the rail to launch her bid entering the final turn, but was outfinished in the late stages.

ENTRY.NAME: Time Ticker
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled rail, rallied 3 wide, closed 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Force
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, led, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Licorice
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, vied rail, rallied 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Rockcliffe
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, tracked rail, rallied 3 wide, closed 4 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 14000. (PLUS UP TO $7,000 THRIF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Weight, 122 lbs.; Non-winners Of A Race Since September 1 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 1 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, For Each $1,250 To $10,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $15 ,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WICKED NIGHT tracked the dueling leaders from along the inside entering the backstretch, commenced his bid two wide entering the final turn, angled inside leaving the turn, then shifted three wide entering the lane, and closed willingly to prove best. LOVEABOVEANDBEYOND broke sharply and vied for the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, set a pressured pace in the run down the backstretch, disposed of her pace rival leaving the turn, but was no match when tackled by WICKED NIGHT in mid stretch, but proved clearly second best. AZOV SEA away alertly and dueled for the lead one out from the rail entering the backstretch, continued to force the issue two wide in the run down the backstretch and into the final turn, was unable to match strides with LOVEABOVEANDBEYOND entering the lane, and finished four wide in the drive to garner a share. LOGICAL AL tracked the dueling leaders into the backstretch while racing two out from the rail, chased the leaders three wide in the run down the backside and through the final turn, but was outfinished in the stretch drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, rallied 2 wide, closed 3 wide, best

ENTRY.NAME: Loveaboveandbeyond
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, vied rail, rallied inside, led, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Azov Sea
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, dueled 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Logical Al
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3 wide, rallied 3 wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 6 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 12000. (PLUS UP TO $6,000 THRIF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since August 1 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $6,25 0, For Each $625 To $5,000 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility). British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $8,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ARTISTIC JEWLER settled off the early pace while saving ground at the rail through the stretch the first time, began to advance three wide entering the backstretch, rallied smartly three wide through the final turn, shifted four wide leaving the turn to quickly assume command, and drew clear as much the best. BELLAROO away well and stalked the leaders through the stretch the first time while racing one out from the rail, maintained her position in the run down the backside, rallied two wide through the final turn, while awaiting racing room, tipped four wide leaving the turn in an attempt to chase ARTISTIC JEWLER, was no match for that rival late, but finished willingly four wide in the drive to prove second best. ZETAMARIE away alertly and tracked the leaders through the stretch the first time while racing two out from the rail, held her position in the run down the backside, rallied three wide through the final turn, and finished two out from the rail in the drive to garner a share. LIZZIES GIRL broke sharply and vied for the lead from along the rail entering the stretch the first time, continued to set a pressured pace in the run down the backstretch and through the final turn, was overtaken entering the lane, and faded in the drive. RICHARDS COMMAND rushed up to duel for the lead from the outside of LIZZIES GIRL entering the stretch the first time, continued to force the issue two wide in the run down the backside and through the final turn, was overtaken entering the lane, and faded in the late stages. ICE BREAKER stalked the leaders through the stretch the first time while saving ground at the rail, began to drop back in the run down the backstretch, and had nothing to offer late.

ENTRY.NAME: Lizzies Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, vied rail, rallied inside, late fade

ENTRY.NAME: Richards Command
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, late fade

ENTRY.NAME: Zetamarie
ENTRY.OWNER: Johnson, Gary C., Pumpkin Stable and Sharlea Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, tracked 3 wide, rallied 3 wide, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Ice Breaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked rail, through early

ENTRY.NAME: Artistic Jewler
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled rail, advanced 1/2, rallied 3 wide, led, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Bellaroo
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, stalked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 4 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 11000. (PLUS UP TO $5,500 THRIF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 1 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since August 1 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000, For Each $500 To $3,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $5,000.

CLAIM.OWNER: Barroby Harold J and Barroby Mrs Harold J

RACE.FOOTNOTES: Y VEE R away alertly and dueled for the lead into the first turn from the outside of ANOTHER GUINNESS, continued to battle with that rival into the backstretch, took control approaching the final turn, and was never seriously threatened late. KNOPFLER stalked the leaders into the backstretch while racing two out from the rail, commenced his bid three wide entering the final turn, and closed willingly three wide in the drive to get up for the place. SELF SERVING tracked the dueling leaders into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, launched his bid three wide entering the final turn, and finished one out from the rail in the drive to garner a share. DRILLER tracked the leaders in the run down the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, rallied smartly two wide through the final turn, while awaiting room leaving the turn, and closed willingly from along the rail in the stretch drive. RING OF KERRY unhurried early while dropping back to trail, commenced his bid four wide entering the final turn, and finished six wide in the drive while improving his position. TIZ MEOW broke sharply and was allowed to settle off the contested early pace while saving ground at the rail in the run down the backstretch, rallied three wide entering the final turn, but failed to make a late impact while finishing four out from the rail in the drive. ANOTHER GUINNESS away well and vied for the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, set a pressured pace in the run down the backstretch, was overtaken approaching the final turn, and faded in the stretch drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Another Guinness
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, vied rail, rallied inside, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Driller
ENTRY.OWNER: Danard Don B and Snow Mel
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed rail

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz Meow
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, settled rail, rallied 3 wide, closed 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Ring of Kerry
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed, rallied 4 wide, closed 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Y Vee R
ENTRY.OWNER: Gilker Robert Gilker Victoria and Chu Ernie
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, dueled 2 wide, led, held

ENTRY.NAME: Self Serving
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2 wide, rallied 3 wide, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Knopfler
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3 wide, rallied 3 wide, closed 3 wide,
